nodes.bodyText: Might be still worth a LOG.debug for when we're ... debugging

The messaged were being duplicated since they were printed here but also printed in AbstractWorkflowResource.java line 321.
Now they are only printed at line 321.
They will be LOG.info though, not LOG.debug.

Ditto, in general think that while user error doesn't rise to the level of warn or error.
It can be useful while debugging
